level.heading: Application to existing relationships.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in ยง 19-1513, an interest in or power over property existing on the effective date of this chapter as to which the time for delivering or filing a disclaimer under law superseded by this chapter has not expired may be disclaimed after the effective date of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-205
level.text: For Law 16-205, see notes following ยง 19-1501.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 16 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act (1999).
